changelog.en:
## SimpleCLSX v1.0.2 - Stability Update

### üéØ What's New
- Enhanced firmware update reliability with improved DFU driver installation
- Optimized USB communication for better device detection
- Improved error handling and recovery mechanisms
- Updated logging system with better diagnostics

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- Fixed intermittent device connection issues on Windows 11
- Resolved firmware update failures with certain USB configurations
- Corrected sequence upload progress reporting
- Fixed memory leak in long-running sequence playback

### üîß Technical Improvements
- Migrated to pnputil for more reliable driver installation
- Enhanced DFU mode detection and automatic driver setup
- Improved thread safety in USB communication layer
- Better error messages for troubleshooting

### üìù Notes
- This update is recommended for all users
- Firmware version 2.0.0 or higher required
- Automatic driver installation now more reliable on Windows 10/11
